title: Business Analyst, Amazon Now, India
description:
Description

We are seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will act as a key liaison between stakeholders, translating business requirements into actionable insights and solutions. As part of the Business Finance team, the Business Analyst will be responsible for working closely with the finance and business partners to analyze data, build inferences, and deliver compelling and actionable data insights in terms of reports and dashboards. Candidate should be proficient in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and SQL for data analysis.

This position is based in Bangalore.

Key job responsibilities

Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and SQL/Python for data analysis.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to work with cross-functional teams.

Ability to interpret complex data and present it in a clear and actionable manner.

Project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines.

Knowledge of business process modeling and requirements gathering techniques.

Basic Qualifications


2+ years of data analytics or automation experience
Bachelor's degree
Knowledge of data pipelining and extraction using SQL
Knowledge of SQL and Excel at a moderate or advanced level
Experience with data mining tools like SQL, SAS, SPSS, or similar


Preferred Qualifications


Experience in data analytics or automation
